select distinct t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id, t1.create_ts, (case when t1.owner_id = #{userId} then 1 else 0 end) as editFlag from t_okr_teams t1 left join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.team_id=t1.id where t1.type='2'
and t2.user_id= #{userId}

select t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id, t1.create_ts from t_okr_teams t1
AND t1.type='2'
and t1.owner_id= #{userId}
and t1.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teamName }, '%')

select t1.id, t1.user_name, t1.real_name, t1.photo_url from t_okr_sys_user t1 join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.user_id = t1.id where t2.team_id = #{teamId} and t1.id != (select owner_id from t_okr_teams where id = #{teamId})

select t1.id, t1.user_name, t1.real_name, t1.photo_url from t_okr_sys_user t1 join t_okr_team_user_rela t2 on t2.user_id = t1.id where t2.team_id = #{teamId} and t1.id != (select owner_id from t_okr_teams where id = #{teamId})
select t1.id, t1.name, t1.owner_id from t_okr_teams t1 join t_okr_manage_object_team_rela t2 on t2.team_id = t1.id where t2.object_id= #{objectId}

SELECT DISTINCT t3.id, t3.user_name, t3.real_name, t3.photo_url FROM t_okr_teams t1 INNER JOIN t_okr_team_user_rela t2 ON t1.ID = t2.team_id INNER JOIN t_okr_sys_user t3 ON t2.user_id = t3.ID
AND t1.owner_id = #{ownerId}
SELECT * FROM t_okr_teams where parent_id = #{parentId} and id != #{parentId}
select t2.id, t2.user_name from t_okr_team_user_rela t1 left join t_okr_sys_user t2 on t1.user_id = t2.id where t1.team_id = #{teamId} and t2.id != '';
